name: Super Realistic Parachute Simulator (LD46)
description:
This is my entry to Ludum Dare 46. It's super realistic, so hopefully you're not afraid of heights. 

Avoid rockets and birds, but don't miss the rings. Survive as long as possible!

Gamepad is supported and preferred. 

You can vote for the game here:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$197596
